Group: Human readable name of the mapping

Options: Arbitrary, no special characters or spaces

Group: Sets types of source (input) data that can be handled by this import mapping. Values are format codes defined by the various DataReader plugins. You can specify multiple formats by specifying their format codes in a semicolon delimited list.
Sets the table for the imported data
Type to set all imported records to. If import includes a mapping to type_id, that will be privileged and the type setting will be ignored.
The number of rows at the top of the data set to skip. Use this setting to skip over column headers in spreadsheets and similar data.
Determines how existing records are checked for and handled for the mapping
Determines how errors are handled for the import. "Stop" will halt the entire import on any error.
Set to yes to save the mapping spreadsheet; no to delete it from the server after import
Set to yes to save the data spreadsheet or no to delete it from the server after import
Use to supply set of XML nodes that will be treated, for purposes of import, as individual records.
